episode_summary: This episode covers a variety of intriguing topics, including the longest professional baseball match, the social behavior of acorn woodpeckers, the world's largest carpet museum, and the first hot-air balloon wedding attempt.

facts.fact: The longest professional baseball match on record only lasted so long because the umpire's rule book was missing the bit that explained when a match should be stopped.
When acorn woodpeckers fight each other, the rumour spreads through the community and other acorn woodpeckers turn up to watch.
The world's largest carpet museum is shaped like a giant roll of carpet.
The world's first ever hot-air balloon wedding was meant to happen in 1865, but the officiating priest refused to go up.
